memberdef.argsstring: (q15_t *pSrc, uint32_t fftLen, const q15_t *pCoef, uint32_t twidCoefModifier)
memberdef.name: riscv_radix4_butterfly_q15

briefdescription.para: Core function for the Q15 CFFT butterfly process.

detaileddescription.para:
end of ComplexFFT group
pSrc16
points to the in-place buffer of Q15 data type
fftLen
length of the FFT
pCoef16
points to twiddle coefficient buffer
twidCoefModifier
twiddle coefficient modifier that supports different size FFTs with the same twiddle factor table
none

memberdef.name: riscv_radix4_butterfly_inverse_q15

briefdescription.para: Core function for the Q15 CIFFT butterfly process.

parameterdescription.para: points to the in-place buffer of Q15 data type
twiddle coefficient modifier that supports different size FFTs with the same twiddle factor table.
points to in-place buffer of unknown 16-bit data type

memberdef.argsstring: (const riscv_cfft_instance_q15 *S, q15_t *p1, uint8_t ifftFlag, uint8_t bitReverseFlag)
memberdef.name: riscv_cfft_q15

briefdescription.para: Processing function for Q15 complex FFT.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of Q15 CFFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place

flag that selects transform direction
value = 0: forward transform
value = 1: inverse transform

flag that enables / disables bit reversal of output
value = 0: disables bit reversal of output
value = 1: enables bit reversal of output
